RECIPE.SUMMARY: Spinach Tofu Lasagna is a healthy vegetarian main course recipe
RECIPE.INGREDIENT:
1 box Lasagna Noodles (regular or whole wheat)
 1 packet Tofu (preferably silken type)
 1 bottle Spaghetti or Pasta Sauce (plain or seasoned)
 1 bunch of Fresh Spinach
 Salt (to taste)
 Pepper (to taste)
 Garlic Powder (to taste)
 1 small can Tomato Sauce
RECIPE.PROCEDURE:
Boil lasagna noodles.
Add fresh spinach to the noodles.
Crumble tofu in a bowl.
Add salt, pepper and garlic powder.
Take a casserole and put the boiled noodles and spinach in it.
Add the seasoned tofu.
Pour the pasta sauce into the casserole. Mix thoroughly.
Add tomato sauce on the top.
Bake in an oven at 190 degree Celsius for 45 minutes or until the top looks done.
Serve hot.
